scene_description_enriched: Two figures, each with a halo, are depicted in profile. The figure on the left wears a red and gold mantle over a blue garment and a grey hat. The figure on the right wears a grey habit and a golden headdress, and holds a vessel. Both figures have red lips and are looking towards each other. The background is a vibrant blue, framed by a gold border with decorative elements. The scene is likely devotional, possibly depicting saints or biblical figures in conversation or exchange.
